description: React component 'TodoItem' that renders a single to-do item with functionalities for editing, toggling completion, and deleting.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Saves the edited todo title if valid, updates parent component, and exits editing mode.

methods.name: cancel
methods.description: Cancels editing and resets draft to original title.

methods.name: onKeyDown
methods.description: Handles key events for 'Enter' (save) and 'Escape' (cancel) during editing.
